channel.title: **solved**
channel.description: I am wondering if anyone could tell me all of the methods and variables for walking in a 317. I am writing one from scratch and i have no clue how it is meant to update, (for all i know i have the packets sent but it doesn't know how to make my person walk). Need some professional help to try and get my character to move. Also need help with the update block, making sure it is correct.

item.title: **solved**
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

I got my player walking now (it was a userID issue actually) and now when ever it tries to walk diagonally it just gets stuck walking back and forth and i dont know why :x

Read full topic
